name: Run Baby Run (Lumy)
description:
Run Baby Run is a 1st person, 3D, single-player, horror puzzle game for PC in which the player controls a baby who woke up from a nightmare in his crib. The baby is terrified and needs to go find his parents, so he goes around the room in search of ways to reach his parents while fighting his fear of the dark.

This was the first 3D game I created, It was solo developed in the space of 4 months as part of the DJD II discipline in the first year of the Video Games degree program.
